markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Future Spell Learning](/Feats.aspx?ID=3842) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 185</row>

**Archetype** [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191)

**Prerequisites**
[Time Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3839)

</column>

---

More future memories of time magic percolate back to the present, teaching you spells you've yet to learn. Add [_behold the weave_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1184), [_cast into time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=880), [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_loose time's arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1185), [_quicken time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1187), [_slow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), and [_stagnate time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1188) to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
name: Future Spell Learning

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Future Spell Learning Source Dark Archive pg. 185 Archetype Time Mage Prerequisites Time Mage Dedication --- More future memories of time magic percolate back to the present, teaching you spells you've yet to learn. Add behold the weave , cast into time , haste , loose time's arrow , quicken time , slow , and stagnate time to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
